channel.title: [317 PI] How to make vesta not crumble
channel.description: Hey guys i want to know how u make it so vesta does not crumble thanks :)

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13899) { c.vlsLeft -= 1; c.degradeVls(); }

along with all the other degradable armor in there

item.title: [317 PI] How to make vesta not crumble
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

[quote=“kirby1996, post:5, topic:409894”]lol ok here it is, i think tihs is the right 1. do u just change the time?

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13899 && c.degradeTime == 450) {// VLS Degrade.
c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
c.sendMessage(“Your vesta’s longsword has degraded into nothing.”); // send a message
c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
}[/quote]

Thank you, remove that whole thing & it stops degrading/crumbling.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] How to make vesta not crumble

item.title: [317 PI] How to make vesta not crumble
item.dc:creator: @kirby1996 kirby1996
item.description:
@kirby1996 wrote:

lol ok here it is, i think tihs is the right 1. do u just change the time?

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13899 && c.degradeTime == 450) {// VLS Degrade.
c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
c.sendMessage(“Your vesta’s longsword has degraded into nothing.”); // send a message
c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
}

Read full topic

item.title: [317 PI] How to make vesta not crumble
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

Go to data/cfg/item.cfg
Search for Vesta’s_longsword or whichever item you want to prevent to crumble. Now when you have found it, note the ID for the item, 12005 for example.

Now go to src/model/players/combathandler.java & search for that ID. Post the whole method in here and I will make it not crumble.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] How to make vesta not crumble
